author: Simon Difford
description: Just as it says on the tin, a Negroni with a splash of cold brew coffee. Simples! Whether you view this as an aperitivo or a breakfast cocktail says a lot about your lifestyle. A proper breakfast is a great way to start the day!
name: Cold Brew Negroni

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
